column4: my xserver still isn't starting, it says the font renderer for ".***" already registered at priority 0
when i type startx it starts for about a second, i see the grey screen with the little x-cursor in the middle, and then it goes back to command line
whatever dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg sets as the ATI driver
my system worked fine until i started screwing around with xorg.conf to try to get more buttons on my mouse working
i don't suppose you backed up a known-good copy before you edited it?
what video card do you have?
lspci will show your hardware info.
it sounds like you've got an X session running already
i get those font errors, i think you can ignore them.
